attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: We, the general public of Great Britain call on our MPs to put forward a vote of no Confidence in our current Prime Minister Kier Starmer. We are sick and tired of his lies and broken promises. We asked for change but we did not ask for him to make this country worse. Help your people now before he runs this country even further into the ground
attributes.background: We, the general public of Great Britain call on our MPs to put forward a vote of no Confidence in our current Prime Minister Kier Starmer. We are sick and tired of his lies and broken promises. We asked for change but we did not ask for him to make this country worse. Help your people now!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister.
